detectors.description:
SmartContract._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SmartContract__1.sol#337-344) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SmartContract__1.sol#341)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SmartContract__1.sol#342)
detectors.markdown:

	- [_balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SmartContract__1.sol#L342)
